Body: Description: Dear Netwrix team I try to install Pingcastle Pro in our environmetn and i am stuck already :). I only have the ZIP file to download. When i check the installation for the IIS Website and navigate i only see in the root folder the favicon.ico file, no ASPX or HTML files. Is this on porpouse? Also according to the installation instructions I am required to install .net V6. But this goes soon EOL Does it work with .Net 8 as well?

What We've Learned Updated: Customer can download the msi and other files from https://backend.pingcastle.com/Download/AskLicense.
ASP.NET 6 Hosting bundle is required. We are aware of upgrade needed.
